alert.note: Alert for Shannon; Texas (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 20 at 7:01PM CDT until August 20 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Shannon County in south central Missouri... East central Texas County in south central Missouri... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 701 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Raymondville, or 14 miles east of Houston, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Current River State Park... Ozark National Scenic Riverways... Round Spring... Akers... Hartshorn... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
